00036 /// struct for holding parameters for a Truncated Lorentzian function
00037 struct PWIZ_API_DECL TruncatedLorentzianParameters
00038 {
00039     double T;
00040     double tau;
00041     std::complex<double> alpha;
00042     double f0;
00043     
00044     TruncatedLorentzianParameters();
00045     TruncatedLorentzianParameters(const TruncatedLorentzianParameters& that);
00046     TruncatedLorentzianParameters(const std::string& filename);
00047 
00048     /// write out to file 
00049     void write(const std::string& filename) const;
00050 
00051     /// write samples to stream
00052     void writeSamples(std::ostream& os) const;
00053 
00054     /// write samples to stream
00055     void writeSamples(std::ostream& os, 
00056                       double frequencyStart, 
00057                       double frequencyStep, 
00058                       int sampleCount) const;
00059 
00060     /// returns parameters in format usable by TruncatedLorentzian class
00061     ublas::vector<double> parameters(double shift=0, std::complex<double> scale=1) const;
00062 
00063     /// reads in parameters from TruncatedLorentzian format
00064     void parameters(const ublas::vector<double>& value, double shift=0, std::complex<double> scale=1);
00065 };
